item.title: Database - Relational Concepts
item.description: Table of Contents General Terminology Relations Attributes Types of Attributes Domains Table Schemas Tuples Put It All Together General Terminology Relational Name Common Name Alternative relation table - attribute column field tuple row record Within a table, every column name must be UNIQUE. Within a Table every row must be UNIQUE (no duplicate data!).
